reviewText: Covers the basics of firearms safety and function. While nonpolitical and easy to understand (especially for seniors), this video still manages to impart basic firearms information foreign to a significant number of journalists. Our team of instructors played this video as part of the first session of dozens of Basic Pistol and Home Firearms Safety courses over 20 years, and used it to educate hundreds of new firearms users.  It as alway well-understood and well-received. The haircuts are now a bit dated, but the safety rules are now still exactly what they were back then.
